title: Disgraced Navi Pillay, declared agent of West leaves UN Human Rights Council in shame
content: Accolades will soon pour in from quarters that are fully satisfied with the role played by Navi Pillay in facilitating their agendas. It showcases how UN has been turned into a peace body flooded by puppets and agents of the West who are being used to legally redraw governance of sovereign nations and through UN…
